name: Rolling Down Hills
description:
Roll downhill as fast as you can, but watch out for bumps, traps, and holes!

Collect coins to unlock new characters and stages!

How far can you go?

HOW TO PLAY

1.Tap to jump.

2.Swipe down to fall faster.

SOUNDS BY

Music and Sounds by: VFR, KOUKAON LABO, MAO-TAMASHII, APPLASEAV, BREEBELLY38, DAVEINCAMAS, DJM62, DUCKDUCKPONY, ECODIOS, FINS, FREQMAN, GDZXPO, HERBERTBOLAND, JARREDGIBB, KICKHAT, KYSTER, LITTLEROBOTSOUNDFACTORY, LUKEIRL, NEOTONE, NICOLASDRWESKI, REINSAMBA, REITANNA, SOMON.RUE, SOUNDSCALPEL.COM, STEFFCAFFREY and TEWELL.
